name: Code Chain
description: An end-to-end solution for real-world asset digitization.
description_long: Legal compliance - Token-level built-in support for regulatory compliant issuance and transactions (KYC/AML)
Programmable assets - Instant dividend or interest payouts, buybacks, voting, asset composition/ decomposition/recomposition
Increased liquidity - Native support for algorithm- based autonomous liquidity reserve mechanism
Public blockchain - Blockchain offers decentralized, secure, transparent, and immutable transactions
Privacy protection - Chain-level control over privacy for assets and owners
No issuance or trading - feesThe platform only charges network transaction fees
